ui.title: Liminal Objectives
ui.subtitle: Set one main intent first, then complete optional secondary tasks.

objectives.label: Main: Set Your Intent
objectives.detail: Inspect any interactive prop (like the center plinth) to define your main challenge before proceeding.

objectives.label: Secondary: Orient To The Portals
objectives.detail: Sweep view across two primary links.

objectives.label: Secondary: Hold Coherence
objectives.detail: Maintain a calm position briefly to steady the space.

objectives.label: Secondary: Verify Hidden Area
objectives.detail: Check the back-left shadow corner to unlock the hidden area.
